page.title: 12Living in Seaton Burn
page.content: I like going for nature walks to look for wild life. I think that people should make it more exciting for children by making an adventure park. There should be playthings and places where you can go for walks. I like { {Seaton Burn}because I can get a good view across the field out of the window. In one of the fields there is a pony and a foal.I know lots of friends. In the summer my dad takes me across the field. My sister Julie takes me to the welfare to play tennis.I can go to the park behind the Post Office, I can ride my bike.
